ComicInfo.Title: Mad's Celebrity Cause-of-Death Betting Odds; Summertime with the Single Career Girl in the Big City; So You Want to Be a Big-Time Network TV Sports Director!; If Truth in Advertising Laws Applied to Comic Book Reviews; Playback; The Lighter Side of…; The Female Basketball Association 1999 Preview; One Fine Day at the Chiropractors’ Convention; Jalopy Shopper; A Mad Look at Rollerjam; Monroe and… Las Vegas Part II; Computer Bomb; NYPD Re-Do
ComicInfo.Summary: A cynical look at justice, experience, gifts, attitude, celebrations, advancement, racing, therapy, crime, relationships, smokers, the office, preschool, and doctors.
